column2: Stolen JPMorgan data rerouted to Russia - BloombergStolen JPMorgan data rerouted to Russia: Bloomberg Investigators working on the cyber attack at JPMorgan Chase & Co have found clues that a global network of computers available for hire was used to send the stolen data to a Russian city

column2: U.S. fast-food workers set for walkouts to demand wage hike Sept 4 Fast-food workers in more than 150 U.S. cities are planning protests on Thursday to press for a wage increase to $15 an hour and allow them to unionize jobs from the fry-basket at McDonald's to the cash register at Burger King.

column2: UPDATE 2-MetLife considers fight against US government's systemic tag WASHINGTON
column3: Sept 4 Insurer MetLife said it is exploring ways to fight the U.S. government's proposal on Thursday to deem it "systemically important" and subject it to stronger regulatory oversight.
